entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 9 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 50 late this evening. Temperature rising to minus 9 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:17 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 8:17 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 8:17 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023
